bookingNotifications.title: Booking Confirmed!
bookingNotifications.body: Your ticket has been confirmed. Have a safe journey!

bookingNotifications.title: Booking Update
bookingNotifications.body: Your ticket status has been updated to RAC. Check your booking for details.

bookingNotifications.title: Booking Reminder
bookingNotifications.body: Your journey to Mumbai starts tomorrow. Don't forget to pack!

bookingNotifications.title: Booking Waitlisted
bookingNotifications.body: Your ticket is currently waitlisted at position WL5. We'll notify you of any changes.

bookingNotifications.title: Payment Successful
bookingNotifications.body: Your payment of ₹1,250 for booking ID IRCTC12345 has been received.

bookingNotifications.title: Tatkal Booking Open
bookingNotifications.body: Tatkal booking for tomorrow is now open. Book quickly to secure your seat!

bookingNotifications.title: E-Ticket Generated
bookingNotifications.body: Your e-ticket has been generated. You can download it from your bookings.

bookingNotifications.title: Booking Cancelled
bookingNotifications.body: Your booking has been cancelled as requested. Refund will be processed in 5-7 days.

offerNotifications.title: Special Discount!
offerNotifications.body: Use code TRAIN20 to get 20% off on your next booking!

offerNotifications.title: Weekend Offer
offerNotifications.body: Book tickets for weekend travel and get 10% cashback!

offerNotifications.title: New User Offer
offerNotifications.body: First time booking? Use WELCOME15 for a special discount!

offerNotifications.title: Premium Membership
offerNotifications.body: Upgrade to premium and get priority bookings and exclusive offers!

offerNotifications.title: Refer & Earn
offerNotifications.body: Refer a friend and both get 50 tokens for free bookings!

offerNotifications.title: Festival Discount
offerNotifications.body: Celebrate Diwali with special 25% off on all bookings!

offerNotifications.title: Credit Card Offer
offerNotifications.body: Pay with HDFC credit card and get 5% instant discount!

offerNotifications.title: Free Food Voucher
offerNotifications.body: Book AC tickets and get a free food voucher worth ₹150!

trainUpdateNotifications.title: Train Delayed
trainUpdateNotifications.body: Rajdhani Express (12301) is running 30 minutes late.

trainUpdateNotifications.title: Platform Change
trainUpdateNotifications.body: Your train will now depart from Platform 5 instead of Platform 3.

trainUpdateNotifications.title: Train Arriving Soon
trainUpdateNotifications.body: Your train is arriving in 15 minutes. Please proceed to the platform.

trainUpdateNotifications.title: PNR Status Update
trainUpdateNotifications.body: Your PNR status has changed from WL3 to Confirmed. Check details.

trainUpdateNotifications.title: Train Cancelled
trainUpdateNotifications.body: Due to maintenance, train number 12345 has been cancelled today.

trainUpdateNotifications.title: Coach Position Updated
trainUpdateNotifications.body: Your coach B1 will be at the front of the train. Check coach position for details.

trainUpdateNotifications.title: Train Rescheduled
trainUpdateNotifications.body: Your train has been rescheduled to depart at 15:30 instead of 14:45.

trainUpdateNotifications.title: Food Order Window
trainUpdateNotifications.body: Food ordering is now available for your journey tomorrow. Order now for best selection!
